__e: When we got back from the restaurant, he'd make me get a hot, wet towel and accompany him to the toilet.

Now, if it were up to me and they gave me two minutes and a wet towel I would personally asphyxiate this half-wit so we could string you up on a federal M1 and end this story with a bag on your head and a paralyzing agent running through your veins.
If things have gone wrong, I'm talking to myself... and you've got a wet towel wrapped around your head.
Yeah, I know, but it's the park and it's watery, and there's a potential hell to pay if I were to be there maybe...
How hot and wet do you like it?
Sometimes it can be wet, cold and nasty.
